sub_title: (Scaled) LEAN Agile Transformation Coach. DevOps and Scaled Agile Structures, R&R, TOM design. LEAN Six Sigma green belt with a passion for technology, people and culture
summary: Valued consultant in innovative organization design for DevOps and Agile transformations. Out of the box analytical thinker designing scaled Agile business and IT operate models for divisions in large multinationals. Ensuring secure and reliable IT as well as increased customer experience whilst supporting their digital and agile transformation.
